reviews.review: 我之前玩过盗版的，现在玩了正版才发现游戏中还有很多模式可以玩，而且十分有趣，非常推荐大家购买。
El mejor juego jamás hecho de puzzles...
WELCOME [REDACTED] TO THE TESTING LAB YOU WILL TEST, TEST, TEST, tEST FOREVER
Puede ser que la campaña no se termine de justificar tanto, pero sigue siendo una experiencia refinadisima de Valve. El cooperativo es uno de los mejores que probé en mi vida.
GReat puzzles, incredibly funny and ingtriguing story

十分优秀的解密游戏。（为第一人称，晕3D的玩家慎入）
1.剧情比较优秀，但是它的剧情大部分都在GLaDOS对话中体现，需要仔细地去观察思考，还是比较好理解的。
2.作为上一部的续作，加入了一些新解密设施，还有多人模式和创意工坊，后期游玩性很高。
十分推荐入库。

This game is the best game I've ever played, and I've played it A LOT because it's that good. This game is so rich with story  and that story still feels new each time I play it. I 100% recommend this game to anyone who is looking to buy it. Go for it, because it's  worth your time, trust me.

Portal 2 is the best puzzle game I HAVE EVER PLAYED (YET). I extremely recommend playing Portal before this, as it helps with the story-line. The game is hilarious, with GLaDOS and Wheatly making you laugh. Also the funniest single-player game I have ever played. On that note, there is a co-op mode. I haven't done much of it, but it looks amazing. WORTH EVERY CENT AND SECOND.
HANG ON, WHY ARE YOU WASTING YOUR TIME READING THIS REVIEW? GO AND BUY PORTAL AND PORTAL 2 NOW!!!!!!

Awesome game, beautiful graphics, nice voice lines!

A lot of you have already have played this game. For the new people...

This game is very true to the original plot to the game, and so much more; there's a lot of hints to the original game, even all the way in the beginning of test chamber 00, when you see the test chambers are deteriorating, and what I mean by this is that there is moss on the walls, plant vines hanging down, etc. And I don't mean that in a negative way; in fact, I personally love the look of something aged, especially like this. Another awesome factor is when one segment of the game (SPOILER ALERT), is when the protagonist [Chell], ends up in the OLD Aperture Science Lab, where she witnesses the beginnings of the test chambers, and (from what I believe is) her father, as well as Caroline, before she turned into GLaDOS, after [former CEO] Cave Johnson fell deathly ill after moon rock poisoning.

TL;DR - If you played the original game, I HIGHLY recommend it. 100/100
this game is so bad, you cant even sleep or craft like in minecraft. you also cant mine and there is no day or night cycle. smh

Going into Portal 2 I was skeptical that it could live up to the innovative mechanics, unique aesthetic, and riveting storytelling of the original. I WAS WRONG. Portal 2 not only keeps the mechanics of the original, but adds on to them with hard-light bridges, gel, and more. The story is larger than the first and their is a new cooperative mode that is a lot of fun to play with friends. My favorite part of the game is how they went with a rusty and grungy aesthetic to completely counter the clean and robotic feel of the original.
Overall, if you have played the original and have not played Portal 2 you must give it a try! Don't be afraid that it won't live up to the expectations because I can assure you that it will not disappoint.

Интересная игра на логику и реакцию, особенно порадовала возможность играть с друзьями. Отдельное внимание уделяется сюжету: жуткий и закрученный, можно найти много моментов, когда игра сама рассказывает тебе свой сюжет. + Есть много достижений, которые сложно получить, это затягивает тебя глубже в игру).
One of the best games I have ever played.

Jeu au gameplay unique/ extrêmement immersif / Expérience de jeu unique.  Scénario impeccable, nouvelles mécaniques, salles de test et environnement plus grands et ouverts que dans le 1er opus. Le tout avec une durée de jeu plus longue, au grand bonheur des joueurs. Incontournable.

A fun, mind-bending puzzle game with an engaging storyline to go along with it

Captivating and exciting puzzle game. Fun and memorable characters and story, and despite it's single-track nature, it has a lot of replay value because there are so many small details that you're bound to miss the first time you play. It's an excellent continuation to the story of the first game - though you may have to discover some of the details yourself. The environments are done beautifully and are overwhelmingly claustrophobic at times. As I feel, this could be classified as psychological horror, as there are multiple locations in the game which, regardless of how many times I had previously been in or around them or whether an active threat was present, triggered my fight or flight response and made me panic. This is probably just me, though. Portal 2 is a game for those who don't mind investigating their surroundings to unlock the lore of the universe and discover the things you probably weren't meant to see.

Hard to find games like this nowadays. 

I'm on my second playthrough almost 10 years after release and I loved it!
